txt.en: 'We have been receiving strange reports from local citizens of their helms being stolen, sometimes from directly off their heads! It seems the local crebain have taken a fancy to their shine, and due to their large size, they are able to make off with the helms easily. This is embarrassing to say, but some of our warriors have even had their helms stolen while they slept! Would you look into the matter? We know the majority of these foul birds make their nests at Ghât Okho, to the east.'
You have successfully retrieved the headwear! Return with the scout to Udlanu in Urmâkh with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to go to Ghât Okho and recover the helms the crebain so brazenly stole.
'Thank you for finding so many! This is quite the relief. Finally the people of Urmâkh can wear hats and helms in the streets without fear again.'
'Your mission, [placeholder], is to go to Ghât Okho and recover the helms those crebain so brazenly stole from us.'
Your mission is to go to Ghât Okho and recover the helms the crebain so brazenly stole.\n\nSpeak to Udlanu to travel.
